Who Am I?

My name is Kyle McGraw, and I'm a Product Owner & UX Designer. I help companies build better digital products through user-centered design, strategic thinking, and data-driven decision making. With expertise in product management, UX design, and business analysis, I bridge the gap between user needs and business goals.

View My WorkLet's Connect

What I Do

I specialize in transforming complex business requirements into intuitive user experiences. From conducting user research and creating wireframes to defining product roadmaps and leading cross-functional teams, I ensure every project delivers real value to both users and stakeholders.

Explore Services

My Clients

I've had the privilege of working with innovative companies across industries, from early-stage startups to established enterprises.

My Journey

A decade of building user-centered solutions across industries, from startups to enterprise clients. Each role shaped my approach to AI-powered product strategy.

Senior UX Designer / Business Analyst

Stakeholder discovery and IA for complex ticketing workflows; clarified requirements and de-risked delivery.
